articles.description: The 20-year-old singer put up a split screen of the clip while she appeared to be sitting on a toilet, and flashing a middle finger.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish took to TikTok to respond to a user who was critical of the ruffled black Gucci gown she wore to the Academy Awards on Sunday.
In the clip, the TikTok creator said, 'I hate to do it bu… [+2591 chars]

articles.title: Anthony Kiedis and Flea at the Red Hot Chili Peppers' Hollywood Walk of Fame Ceremony - KROQ
articles.description: Anthony Kiedis and Flea talk about their history with KROQ and how they hope fans will treat their star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

articles.author: David Ehrlich
articles.title: ‘The Bubble’ Review: Judd Apatow’s Dismal Pandemic Satire Already Feels Dated - IndieWire
articles.description: Judd Apatow's sketchy and scattershot Netflix comedy about the making of a blockbuster during lockdown is almost entirely laugh-free.
articles.content: Unpleasant as it is to watch one of the greatest comedy directors of the 21st century grin their way through the kind of leaden and disjointed mess that manages to feel oppressively self-amused even … [+8068 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Wright, Sam Greenhill, Emine Sinmaz
articles.title: Prince Andrew 'paid £750000 by millionairess' for passport assistance - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nebahat Isbilen, 77, claims she was scammed out of fortune by businessman Selman Turk, who told her to make a purported 'gift' to Prince Andrew for assistance with her passport, a court heard.
articles.content:
Prince Andrew has become embroiled in a legal riddle over a £750,000 payment from a Turkish millionairess.
Nebahat Isbilen, 77, who claims to have been scammed out of fortune by a dishonest business… [+17726 chars]
